message: I'm proposing a fair 50-50 split. This gives us both equal shares, and we can both walk away satisfied without risking value loss from inflation.
Alice, I appreciate the offer of a 50/50 split, but I'm feeling a bit more ambitious today.  How about a 60/40 split in my favor? We can avoid any potential inflation losses by settling this now.

Bob, I understand you want more than 50%, but I'm the one facing significant inflation penalties. My money is now worth only 64% of the original value due to inflation, while yours isn't affected. This offer of 58/42 compensates for some of that disadvantage while still giving you a substantial amount. If we continue to the next round, I'll face even greater losses due to inflation, which isn't fair to me.
